doc.title: Video: Michael Moore: 'Democracy is not a spectator sport'
doc.author: Guardian staff reporter
doc.description: Michael Moore pours scorn on Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi while promoting his new documentary, Capitalism: A Love Story, at the Venice film festival
doc.tags: Michael Moore,Venice film festival,Film,Culture,Festivals,Silvio Berlusconi,Venice film festival 2009,Capitalism: A Love Story

main.head: Michael Moore: 'Democracy is not a spectator sport'
main.p: This article is more than 15 years old
Michael Moore pours scorn on Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi while promoting his new documentary, Capitalism: A Love Story, at the Venice film festival
